author: Marion Fourcade, Henry Farrell
title: The Dangers of Moving All of Democracy Online
description: To protect governments as well as people’s rights from coronavirus, we need to use tech as a scalpel, not a sledgehammer.
content: Governments around the world are struggling to deal with the public health and economic challenges of coronavirus. While many have pointed to how authoritarian regimes exacerbated the pandemic, weve so far paid dangerously little attention to coronaviruss cha… [+5417 chars]
